title: Has anyone written any flattering books about Donald Trump that he didn’t co-author? - Quora

response.answer_text: Think of it this way. His opposition hates him with a passion. He has singlehandedly done more good for this nation than any president in history. But he does not take idiots gladly and has no problem calling them out and shaming them. This infuriates the left. So we are left with 97% negative coverage of him and the left seeks anyone whatsoever to write negative things about him. To put it in perspective, if their hero Obama did the exact same things Trump has done, he would be regaled in history as the greatest thing since sliced bread
